alert.note: Alert for Fairbanks North Star; Yukon-Koyukuk (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 8:10PM AKDT until July 10 at 8:45PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Yukon-Koyukuk in Alaska... Southwestern Fairbanks North Star in Alaska... * Until 845 PM AKDT. * At 808 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles south of Ester, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas south of the Fairbanks metro area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
